verbs.description: President Trump [V: will] meet with House Republicans on Capitol Hill Tuesday to discuss the issue
[ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: meet] [ARG1: with House Republicans on Capitol Hill] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-PNC: to discuss the issue]
[ARG0: President Trump] will meet with House Republicans on Capitol Hill Tuesday to [V: discuss] [ARG1: the issue]
